co.lqnt.lockbox.key

Class PublicKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.lqnt.lockbox.key.PublicKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyInterface, PublicKeyInterface

    public class PublicKey
extends Object
implements PublicKeyInterface
    Represents an Lockbox public key.
